block.p: Ruth Collins Bradley, a daughter of Patricia Place Smith of Millbrook, N.Y., and Otis Treat Bradley of New York, was married yesterday in Dorset, Vt., to Todd Stuart Harrington, a son of Carol and Roby Harrington III of Boca Grande, Fla. The Rev. Dr. James H. Gray performed the ceremony at the United Church of Dorset and East Rupert.

The bride is a director of fund-raising and events at George Trescher Associates, a special events consulting firm in New York. She graduated from Washington College in Chestertown, Md. Her father is the director of research and a managing director at Gilford Securities in New York. Her mother is a broker in Millbrook with Gurnsey Real Estate.
